entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending after midnight then clearing. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:28 PM MST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few clouds. High minus 29.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 29. Wind chill near minus 42. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:28 PM MST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 24 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming south 30 km/h overnight. Temperature rising to minus 24 by morning. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:28 PM MST Sunday 08 January 2023
